articles.description: It’s pretty rare to see A-List celebrities riding a humble automatic scooter on Indian roads. Ace cricketer Virat Kohli and his actress wife Anushka Sharma recently took a spin on a Suzuki Access 125. The couple were in Madh Island, Mumbai, for a shoot, post …
